simplenlg.syntax

Class VerbPhraseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • simplenlg.syntax.VerbPhraseHelper

  • public abstract class VerbPhraseHelper
extends Object

    This class contains static methods to help the syntax processor realise verb phrases. It adds auxiliary verbs into the element tree as required.

    Version:
    4.0
    Author:
    D. Westwater, University of Aberdeen.

    • Method Detail

      • realise

        public NLGElement realise(SyntaxProcessor parent,
                          PhraseElement phrase)
        The main method for realising verb phrases.
        Parameters:
        parent - the SyntaxProcessor that called this method.
        phrase - the PhraseElement to be realised.
        Returns:
        the realised NLGElement.

      • realiseComplements

        protected abstract void realiseComplements(SyntaxProcessor parent,
                                           PhraseElement phrase,
                                           ListElement realisedElement)
        Realises the complements of this phrase.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent SyntaxProcessor that will do the realisation of the complementiser.
        phrase - the PhraseElement representing this noun phrase.
        realisedElement - the current realisation of the noun phrase.

      • splitVerbGroup

        protected abstract void splitVerbGroup(Stack<NLGElement> vgComponents,
                                       Stack<NLGElement> mainVerbRealisation,
                                       Stack<NLGElement> auxiliaryRealisation)
        Splits the stack of verb components into two sections. One being the verb associated with the main verb group, the other being associated with the auxiliary verb group.
        Parameters:
        vgComponents - the stack of verb components in the verb group.
        mainVerbRealisation - the main group of verbs.
        auxiliaryRealisation - the auxiliary group of verbs.

      • createVerbGroup

        protected abstract Stack<NLGElement> createVerbGroup(SyntaxProcessor parent,
                                                     PhraseElement phrase)
        Creates a stack of verbs for the verb phrase. Additional auxiliary verbs are added as required based on the features of the verb phrase.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent SyntaxProcessor that will do the realisation of the complementiser.
        phrase - the PhraseElement representing this noun phrase.
        Returns:
        the verb group as a Stack of NLGElement s.

      • pushModal

        protected void pushModal(String actualModal,
                         PhraseElement phrase,
                         Stack<NLGElement> vgComponents)
        Pushes the modal onto the stack of verb components.
        Parameters:
        actualModal - the modal to be used.
        phrase - the PhraseElement representing this noun phrase.
        vgComponents - the stack of verb components in the verb group.

      • pushIfModal

        protected NLGElement pushIfModal(boolean hasModal,
                                 PhraseElement phrase,
                                 NLGElement frontVG,
                                 Stack<NLGElement> vgComponents)
        Pushes the front verb on to the stack if the phrase has a modal.
        Parameters:
        hasModal - the phrase has a modal
        phrase - the PhraseElement representing this noun phrase.
        frontVG - the first verb in the verb group.
        vgComponents - the stack of verb components in the verb group.
        Returns:
        the new element for the front of the group.

      • checkImperativeInfinitive

        protected void checkImperativeInfinitive(Object formValue,
                                         NLGElement frontVG)
        Checks to see if the phrase is in imperative, infinitive or bare infinitive form. If it is then no morphology is done on the main verb.
        Parameters:
        formValue - the Form of the phrase.
        frontVG - the first verb in the verb group.

      • grabHeadVerb

        protected NLGElement grabHeadVerb(PhraseElement phrase,
                                  Tense tenseValue,
                                  boolean hasModal)
        Grabs the head verb of the verb phrase and sets it to future tense if the phrase is future tense. It also turns off negation if the group has a modal.
        Parameters:
        phrase - the PhraseElement representing this noun phrase.
        tenseValue - the Tense of the phrase.
        hasModal - true if the verb phrase has a modal.
        Returns:
        the modified head element

      • pushParticles

        protected void pushParticles(PhraseElement phrase,
                             SyntaxProcessor parent,
                             Stack<NLGElement> vgComponents)
        Pushes the particles of the main verb onto the verb group stack.
        Parameters:
        phrase - the PhraseElement representing this noun phrase.
        parent - the parent SyntaxProcessor that will do the realisation of the complementiser.
        vgComponents - the stack of verb components in the verb group.

      • determineNumber

        protected NumberAgreement determineNumber(NLGElement parent,
                                          PhraseElement phrase)
        Determines the number agreement for the phrase ensuring that any number agreement on the parent element is inherited by the phrase.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent element of the phrase.
        phrase - the PhraseElement representing this noun phrase.
        Returns:
        the NumberAgreement to be used for the phrase.

      • isCopular

        public boolean isCopular(NLGElement element)
        Checks to see if the base form of the word is copular, i.e. be.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the element is copular.
